action.action-desc: Mr. Marchant (for himself, Mr. Smith of Missouri, and Mr. Danny K. Davis of Illinois) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the amount allowed as a deduction for interest on education loans paid by married couples.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fairness and Opportunities for Married Households With Student Loans Act.

section.header: Increase in deduction for interest on education loans paid by married couples

subsection.text: Section 221(b)(1) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by inserting ($5,000 in the case of a joint return) after $2,500.
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall apply to amounts paid in taxable years beginning after the date of the enactment of this Act.
